text.div:
BEMedicationIG

The official URL for this implementation guide is: 

https://www.hl7belgium.be/fhir/ImplementationGuide/hl7.be.fhir.medicationig

ImplementationGuide for HL7 Belgium Medication Work Group

name: BEMedicationIG
title: HL7 Belgium Medication Implementation Guide
description: ImplementationGuide for HL7 Belgium Medication Work Group
